name: dilutedsearch
title: Diluted Search
description: An add-on that dilutes/hides actual google searches by performing additional searches in the background using popular terms of different categories
author: Zhongyi Jin <pipilu8@icloud.com>, Aaron Jow

preferences.name: searchInterval
preferences.title: Search Time Interval
preferences.description: When triggered, this is the time window that diluted-searches will be performed, in seconds

preferences.name: numSearches
preferences.title: Number of Diluted-Searches Per Actual Google Search
preferences.description: When triggered, this is the number of diluted-searches that will be created and randomly scheduled across the above time interval

preferences.name: queueSize
preferences.title: Diluated Search Queue Size
preferences.description: Defines the maximum number of diluated-searches that can be queued in the future. If the queue is full, no new diluated-searches will be scheduled

preferences.name: minSearchGap
preferences.title: Minimal time delay between diluted-searches, in seconds
preferences.description: This adds the minimal time delay between two consecutive diluted-searches. If set too small, Google may send out warnings since too many searches are carried out in a short period of time

preferences.name: PopularCategory
preferences.title: Popular Category
preferences.description: Generate diluted-searches using popular search terms gathered from Wikipedia

preferences.name: MedicineCategory
preferences.title: Medicine Category
preferences.description: Generate diluted-searches using medical terms gathered from Wikipedia

preferences.name: pageWorkers
preferences.title: Number of Search Buffers
preferences.description: This is the number of buffers used for diluted-searches

preferences.name: searchHistorySize
preferences.title: Search History Size
preferences.description: Max number of most recent searches to log
